bebdad9f-7e9c-4bca-92d3-858fa5672403.notes: Or three, and raise one (or a grappling skill) by a level.

73e35089-4788-4df2-ac23-c97afd4f452f.notes: Allows parrying two different attacks per turn, one with each hand.

5aeb59a4-bb45-4aeb-a787-67f8f90af7fe.notes: Either two or six points may be used to level-up one of these skills.

33c6e115-c50c-492d-96f0-2a95d7e875b9.notes: Either two or six of those points may be used to increase one of these skills by one or two levels.
